=== Summary ===

One of the biggest hurdles for people using Malone, regardless of skill level, is the separation of bugs and bug tasks. Without permission to combine them, there are some things we can do to ease the pain: give tasks the same URL structure and IDs as bugs, and make the task page clearer and more useful, including a status whiteboard.
